tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE emission_reduction (
  reduction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  emission_id INT,
  source_id INT,
  reduction_amount DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (emission_id) REFERENCES carbon_emissions(emission_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES renewable_energy_sources(source_id)
);

CREATE TABLE emission_reduction_projects(
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   project_name VARCHAR(255),
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE,
   total_reduction INT
);
